message.content:
1. The Psychosocial Depressive Symptoms Questionnaire (PDS) was used in the study.
2. The Perceived Stress Scale (PSS) was used in the study.
3. The study examined the effect of two doses of 5-ALA.
4. The doses of 5-ALA used were 15 mg and 50 mg.
5. The study looked at the effect of 5-ALA on various components of mood.
6. The components of mood examined were hopefulness, loneliness, and motivation.
7. The study also examined the effect of 5-ALA on coping ability.

messages.content:
Statement: The Psychosocial Depressive Symptoms Questionnaire (PDS) and the Perceived Stress Scale (PSS) were used to examine the effect of two doses of 5-ALA (15 mg and 50 mg) on various components of mood (i.e., hopefulness, loneliness, and motivation) and coping ability.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
